thread.section_title: Verc Car Rental Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Verc Car Rental | verc.com | 5 of 5
thread.title: WILLIAM
thread.title_full: Verc Car Rental reviewed by WILLIAM

author: WILLIAM
title: WILLIAM
text: We only have one car in the family (smaller carbon footprint) and yet I need to rent a car once or twice per month for work related activity. Verc has always been my choice and they have never let me down. Good, honest people and the vehicle selection, while not a huge inventory, is still good. They have been great for me and my family.
